subject: My EVP & ITC experimentation systems tour
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
For those who care to see... I've posted a quick 4 minute video tour of 
the EVP and ITC systems I use, with a quick explanation of their setup.
The video is at:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gyQKmBXY1ig

Thanks...
and have a super-natural paranormal day!
- Mike Coletta
http://www.ufomagazine.net
